project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises ESGOM's generation development program for the 4-year period FY 1973 through FY 1977, and consists of: (a) the construction of a barrage over the submerged weir constructed in Tedzani Stage I; (b) the construction of a 20-MW hydroelectric power station as an extension of the existing Tedzani Stage I power station; (c) the addition of a 12-MW gas turbine unit, initially to avoid a power shortage in 1975/76, and subsequently for operation as a standby and peaking unit; and (d) a tariff study.
